ad_text: Sierra Propane Sponsored As a Propane Delivery Driver, you are a key point of contact for our customers. We are looking for dedicated and responsible people that can excel in a fast-paced work environment and possess exceptional people skills. This position requires an individual to safely drive a propane delivery vehicle to customer locations. This position also requires someone with a positive and enthusiastic attitude toward Safety, Sales, Customer Service, and Employee Team-Work. Responsibilities: - Ability to drive and operate a propane delivery truck in a safe and efficient manner. - Ability to work outside in varying weather and driving conditions. - Ability to work after-hours emergency call-outs. - Meet daily delivery objectives as directed by Dispatch. - Inspect vehicle daily and report problems in accordance with company policy and DOT regulations. - Excellent customer service skills. - Desire to succeed in a team environment. - Prior propane gas delivery experience preferred. - Work with state of the art delivery system. Request an application at https://www.sierrapropane.com/about-us/join-our-team/ . Complete the form and click the "Submit" button or call (928) 333-5550 FULL-TIME · $20 - $22 / HOUR · SPRINGERVILLE Propane Delivery Driver Apply now
